CustomField.description: Name Not Verified is backwards, so sort of using this to obfuscate that and make other formulae easier to read.
CustomField.formula: IF( Account_Name_Verified__c = true && ISPICKVAL(Address_Verification_Status__c, 'Verified'), true, false)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Are both the name and the address not verified?
CustomField.label: Account Name & Address Verified?
